valid_thought.description: A thought is valid if it preserves coherence, origin, and amendment lineage.

thought_coherence.description: Thought must align logically with its upstream dependencies.

thought_origin_trace.description: Valid thoughts must carry their authorship lineage.

reflexive_integrity.description: The thought can evaluate its own coherence and amendment status.

semantic_containment.description: A thought must not introduce terms beyond its declared interface.
